g.text: sharp change in value causes an edgel
使用x,y方向的一阶导数表示梯度，再用该导数计算梯度方向及大小
使用 finite differences 计算“一阶导数”,即相邻pixel值的差
选择一个阈值判断是否是边缘，选择阈值过程为 thresholding
不考虑噪声，通过考虑更多的近邻解决
先用低通滤波器对初始图片卷积
滤波器与低通结合成一个新滤波器
step 或 ramp edge 会导致相邻像素被判为边缘
可能会偏向某些方向的边缘
Curvature based edge detectors (Marr-Hildreth edge detector)
边缘存在于一阶导数极大值或极小值处
finds the correct positions of the edges
使用 finite differences 计算“二阶导数”
the filter should respond to edges only and not noise
the detected edge is near the true edge
the edge's exact location is marked with a single point response
1. Suppress noise using low pass filtering
2. Compute gradient magnitude and direction images
3. Apply non-maxima suppression to the gradient magnitude image
4. Use hysteresis and connectivity analysis to detect edges
